DOC.criteria: Invisalign `` Full Treatment '' product Have permanent dentition 1846 year old , inclusive Angle Class I ½ cusp Class II molar canine relationship Crowding least 4 mm least one arch Subjects fulfill inclusion criterion requirement Craniofacial anomaly present Past present sign symptoms periodontal disease A significant medical medication history would adversely affect development structure teeth jaws subsequent tooth movement Previous orthodontic orthopedic relapse within 5 year History trauma , bruxism , parafunction Skeletal jaw discrepancy Use osteoporosis drug Initial use auxiliary mechanic elastic
